Package babble.net

Network layer of asynchrnous communication.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ExecutionContext
    An execution context provides environment variables to a route.
    Protocol<R extends Request,P extends Response>
    A communication protocol with asynchronous Request and Response.
    ResponseCallback
    A callback function to receive a response.
    Route<R extends Request,P extends Response>
    A route is an operation that accepts a request and generate a response.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    NetworkBuffer
    A buffer for data to be written on a network channel.
    NioClient<R extends Request,P extends Response>
    A client to a server.
    NioServer<R extends Request,P extends Response>
    A server for asynchronous network based request-response processing.
    Request
    A request carries input data required execute an operation.
    Response
    A response at network level is simply an array of bytes.
    Router<R extends Request,P extends Response>
    A router manages asynchronous request-response processing.

Package babble.net Description

Network layer of asynchrnous communication. Transfers raw bytes over sockets. Provides basic support for higher level protocols, such as routing request.
